name: zyd232's Stasis Pod/Chamber
description:
If you want to buy me a coffee, here's the link~

如果你想打赏我，这里是链接~

　

While using this LoRA, I recommend a weight between 0.6 and 1.0.

While using the trigger word "stasis pod", you can give it a high weight. Usually, I use a weight between 1 and 1.5.

If the object comes outside the chamber, use the tag "in container" to put it back into the chamber. But do not give the tag "in container" a high weight, it may replace the chamber with a jar. Usually, 0.5 is enough.

This LoRA does not contain any face information. If you have face problems caused by the model you use, try Face Editor.

You are welcome to share your pics generated with this LORA. But please keep those extremely NSFW ones to yourself.

　

-

　

使用该LoRA时，推荐权重为0.6~1.0。

使用触发词“stasis pod”时，可以给它一个较高的权重，通常来说1~1.5。

如果培养舱内的东西跑出来了，可以使用“in container”这个标签把它放进去。但是不要给“in container”这个标签太高的权重，权重太高可能会把培养舱变成普通的玻璃罐子。通常来说，0.5的权重就够了。

这个LoRA不包含脸部信息。如果你遇到脸部模糊之类的问题，是你所使用的模型导致的。推荐使用 Face Editor 插件修复。

欢迎分享你用这个LORA生成的图片。但是请不要分享过于暴露的内容。

　

　

推荐国内在线生图的模型分享网站：

tusi.art - 吐司，可以在线生图的模型分享社区
